product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: ELECTRICAL WORKS > PLUGS, SOCKETS AND JUNCTION BOXES
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply and  installation of platform Lighting pole as per std. 7-51-0202,  including all welding, structural works, paint and all sundry materials as required, including painting, (excluding supply and installation of control gear box/junction box), but including all labour and materials, as per approved drawings, specifications of this tender and directions of Engineer-in-Charge. Lighting poles for hazardous areas.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: standard: 7-51-0202, inclusion: welding, structural works, paint, sundry materials, painting, all labour and materials, as per approved drawings, specifications of this tender and directions of engineer-in-charge, exclusion: supply and installation of control gear box/junction box, area: hazardous

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: ELECTRICAL WORKS > PLUGS, SOCKETS AND JUNCTION BOXES
product_entries.full_product_description: Installation, connection, testing and commissioning of following types of flame proof/Div.2 lighting fixtures and accessories, including cable termination and connection, fixing of cable glands, lugs, including supply of necessary hardwares,including transportation from store/yard to site at the place of installation, unpacking, including all labour and materials, as per approved drawings, specifications of this tender and directions of Engineer-in-Charge. Well glass type pole mounting type for Platform.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: type: flame proof/Div.2, accessory: well glass type pole mounting, inclusion: cable termination and connection, fixing of cable glands, lugs, supply of necessary hardwares, transportation from store/yard to site, unpacking, all labour and materials, as per approved drawings, specifications of this tender and directions of engineer-in-charge

original_rows.3: Supply and  installation of platform Lighting pole as per std. 7-51-0202,  including all welding, structural works, paint and all sundry materials as required, including painting, (excluding supply and installation of control gear box/junction box), but including all labour and materials, as per approved drawings, specifications of this tender and directions of Engineer-in-Charge.
HAZARDOUS AREA LIGHTING FIXTURES AND ACCESSORIES

Installation, connection, testing and commissioning of following types of flame proof/Div.2 lighting fixtures and accessories, including cable termination and connection, fixing of cable glands, lugs, including supply of necessary hardwares,including transportation from store/yard to site at the place of installation, unpacking, including all labour and materials, as per approved drawings, specifications of this tender and directions of Engineer-in-Charge.
Well glass type pole mounting type for Platform.

Supply of following FLP/Div.2 lighting fixtures complete with lamps, requisite FLP cable glands, plugs and necessary control gear as per EIL standard specification No. 6 -51-0061, data sheet for lighting fixture schedule, including all albour and materials,specifications of this tender and directions of Engineer-in-Charge.
